name: Mecon
description:
Mecon is a sandbox game using truncated octahedrons as the core building block.

This shape was used because it was the only shape besides a cube that tessalates perfectly in 3D space.

The name "Mecon" comes from the name that Buckminster Fuller called them.

Check out the wiki for more info into this wacky shape! Wikipedia

                               

                  

The base programming is based off of the video series "Make Minecraft in Unity 3D" By B3agz. Most of the code has been heavily adapted to work for our needs, but we could not have done any of this without help from him. Thank you B3ags!

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Jump

E - Inventory

R - Rotate Block

ESC - Quit Game

KNOWN BUGS

Cursor still shows up

Sometimes chunks disappear

Half slabs do not have the correct hitbox
